text: Chiyoko Szlavnics (born 1967 in Toronto, Ontario) is a Canadian experimental composer currently based in Berlin, Germany. ==Education and Career== Szlavnics graduated with honours from the University of Toronto Faculty of Music in 1989 and moved to Berlin ten years later. == References == ==External links== * Chiyoko Szlavnics from Discogs website * official website Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Musicians from Toronto Category:Experimental composers Category:21st-century Canadian composers Category:Canadian expatriates in Germany
title: Chiyoko Szlavnics
